desc: A variety of gifts are available in exchange for your donation. All proceeds support our Hope Spot expeditions and initiatives to protect the planet's blue heart. Gifts are made to order and fulfillment may take up to 12 weeks. The shipping method that is selected at checkout is applied after the order is fulfilled.

layout.text:
All proceeds support our Hope Spot expeditions and initiatives to protect the planet's blue heart. Gifts are made to order and fulfillment may take up to 12 weeks. The shipping method that is selected at checkout is applied after the order is fulfilled.
Looking for more books by Dr. Sylvia Earle? Find them on Amazon.
All sales are final as each item is made-to-order. We do not accept returns or exchanges.
